title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7851.1 - State Energy Plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7851.1 - State Energy Plan

State Regulations

The board shall adopt a State Energy Plan, based on the
record before it, which addresses each item identified in section
6-104
(2)
of the Energy Law. The board shall
publish the plan on the State Energy Plan website and notify the board's
service list when the plan is published. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7851.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
